title: unai theLindhiDuvay uLamE
sahitya:
unnait-teLindiDuvAi uLamE 



anupallavi



unnai shiva sattenrE uLLapaDi arindAl innalillai enrum

inbaminba-minbamE



caraNam



cintai alaiyAmal dhyAnattil kUTTuvAi dinam dinam manadirkku

shivabhakti UTTuvAi

vandadum pOnadum varundi ninaiyAdE vAgAyirundapaDi shOkam bhAvanai

seydAl
